12.big bear, paynes grey, lamp black no.36, oil on canvas, 48x60 inches, '04.jpg
splash.text:
Roni Stretch's career path exemplifies how California has attracted a growing number of international artists in recent years. His technique displays a formidable grasp of his medium – oil – that is unusually nuanced and sophisticated, and yet his distinctive large scale portraits also betray a connection to the media – fueled culture that is specific to Southern California. The idea of process – the painstaking execution that transpires over long periods of time, is central to the understanding and appreciation of Stretch’s ambitious oeuvre.

- Wesley Jessup Executive Director,
Pasadena Museum of California Art

bigbear.paintings: The Big Bear paintings were created one winters evening back in the fall of 2000. The photographs I took lasted all of around 45 seconds, as the cars behind me began hooting their horns and getting very impatient realising I had just blocked the only small road leading out of the mountain. The sun was setting and I thought the light and composition worked very well. Not realising at that moment what I had, those few shots enabled me to create a series of over 130 paintings some ten years in the making. 1.big bear,paynes grey, lamp black no.1, oil on canvas, 48x60 inches, '00 ..jpg 2.big bear,raw sienna. lamp black no.3, oil on canvas, 48x60 inches, '00..jpg 3.big bear, raw sienna, lamp black no.4, oil on canvas, 48x60 inches, '00..jpg 4.big bear, paynes grey, lamp black no.6,oil on canvas, 48x60 inches,'00..jpg 5.big bear,paynes grey, lamp black no.7, oil on canvas, 48x60 inches, '01..jpg 6.big bear,paynes grey, lamp black no.10, oil on canvas, 48x60 inches,'01..jpg 7.big bear, paynes grey, lamp black no.13, oil on canvas, 48x60 inches, '01..jpg 8.big bear,paynes grey, raw sienna no.16, oil on canvas, 48x70 inches,'02.jpg 9.big bear, paynes grey, lamp black no. 17, oil on canvas, 48x70 inches, '02.jpg 10.big bear, paynes grey, lamp black no.18, oil on canvas, 55x60 inches, '02..jpg 11.big bear, paynes grey, lamp black no. 20 oil on canvas, 48x60 inches, '02..jpg 12.big bear, paynes grey, lamp black no.36, oil on canvas, 48x60 inches, '04..jpg 13.big bear,paynes grey, lamp black no. 60 , oil on canvas, 50x70 inches, '07..jpg 14.big bear, paynes grey, lamp black no.62, oil on canvas, 50x70 inches,'07..jpg 15.big bear, paynes grey, lamp black no.63, oil on canvas, 50x70 inches,'07..jpg 16.big bear, paynes grey, lamp black no.64, oil on canvas, 50x70 inches, '07..jpg 17.big bear, paynes grey, lamp black no. 65, oil on canvas, 48x70 inches, '07..jpg 18.big bear, paynes grey, lamp black no.69, oil on canvas, 48x70 inches,'08.jpg 19.big bear, paynes grey, lamp black no.70, oil on canvas, 48x60 inches,'08..jpg

data.biography:
RONI STRETCH 1964 - Born St.Helens, Merseyside, England.
Works and resides in Los Angeles, CA
EDUCATION 1982 - St.Helens College of Art & Design,
83 St.Helens, Merseyside, England.
SELECTED SOLO SHOWS 2008 'Veronica's Napkin'
Deborah Page Gallery
Santa Monica, CA
"Dichromatic Paintings"
Canvas BG, Malibu CA 2007 "Dichromatic Portraits"
Anne Reed Gallery,
Ketchum, Idaho 2006 "Brandenburg"
Peyton Right Gallery
Santa Fe NM 2005 'Dichromatic Portraits"
Gallery C Hermosa Beach ,CA 2004 Gallery C @ Bvlgari
Rodeo Dr, Beverly Hills CA
"Thin Ice, Titanium White' 2004 Off Main-Media Rare Gallery in
conjunction with Steve Michel Gallerie,
Bergamot Station, Santa Monica, CA
"Dichromatic paintings & photographs" 2003 The Wiesman Collection -
Paintings from the early 90's"
Bliss, Beverly Hills, CA. 2001 Steve Michel Gallerie,
New York. NY.
'Dichroism - Recent Paintings" 1999 Steve Michel Gallerie,
New York. NY.
"The Suede Effect" 1998 Simon Schade Gallery,
Los Angeles CA.
"Faces & Figures" 1998 Enclave Gallery,
Venice, CA. 1997 International Art Gallery,
Orange County CA.
SELECTED GROUP SHOWS 2009 Madison Gallery
La Jolla, CA
The Edge Gallery
Santa Fe, NM 2008 Anne Reed Gallery
Ketchum, Idaho 2007 "Summer Show"
Anne Reed Gallery
Ketchum, Idaho 2006 "Retrospective/Prospective
Anne Reed Gallery,
Ketchum, Idaho 2005 Los Angeles County Museum of Art
AR&S, Leo S.Bing Center
Los Angeles. CA 2005 "New Old Masters,"
curated by Donald Kuspit
Gallery C, Hermosa Beach, CA. 2005 "Fresh" Museum of Contemporary Art
Geffen Contemporary, Los Angeles, CA 2005 "Inter Acts"
Inter Gallery, Piazza Diaz 6
Milan, Italy 2004 "Nine" Gallery C
Hermosa Beach, CA
SELECTED SPECIAL PROJECTS 2009 Red Tie Affair, American Red Cross
Fairmont Miramar Hotel
Santa Monica, CA
LA Lakers Youth Foundation
Riviera Country Club, Pacific Palisades, CA
Fed Ex/St.Judes Angels and Stars Gala
Miami, Florida 2008 Art Seen, benefiting Aids Research Alliance
Smash Box Studios, LA, CA
Crossroads Art '08
"What does green mean to you?"
Tract 16 gallery, Bergamot St.
Santa Monica CA 2007 Art for Art Benefit Auction at the Next Stage
Ketchum, Idaho 2006 Venice Family Clinic
Bergamont Station, Santa Monica, CA 2005 Center Theatre Group, "Angels Night"
Mark Taper Forum, Beverly Hills, CA 2004 Gerkha Welfare Trust and the Bristol Cancer
Health Center, Royal Polo Match, Cirencester,
Gloucestershire, Uk 2002 Official Artist of the Peoples Choice Awards,
Los Angeles, CA. 2001 A Community of Angels Project,
Los Angeles, CA.
Official Artist of the American Music Awards,
Los Angeles, CA.

SELECTED PUBLIC / CORPORATE COLLECTIONS Pasadena Museum of California Art
Pasadena, CA Museum of California Design
Los Angeles, CA Museum of Design, Art and Architecture
